name: Brave New Media
description:
Started in 1998, Brave New Media is a content development and new media agency. We believe that relationships are the foundation of good work. With 16 years of experience with design, content, and technology, Brave New Media builds relationships that last based on transparency and performance.
Based in Minneapolis with operations in Cyprus and Los Angeles we work and think beyond borders; From philanthropic efforts with non-profit organizations, to small businesses and large-scale, global corporations.
